attributes.action: Bring criminal charges against any MP's found to have fraudulently claimed expenses from the tax payer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government must look at bringing criminal charges for fraud against any MP found to have fraudulently claimed for any expenses, whether it is 'flipping' the second home to evade tax or claiming for a mortgage that has been paid off.  The common man in the street would face prosecution so those in power must be accountable.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
